CheckTitle: Ensure GCP Certificate Manager certificates have sufficient expiration periods
Description: Verify that all certificates managed by GCP Certificate Manager have an expiration date that is not too near, ensuring compliance with retention policies. A threshold of at least 7 days before expiry is required.
Risk: Certificates nearing expiration or expired may lead to service disruption and non-compliance with security policies.

Recommendation.Text: Update your certificates to ensure they have a sufficient validity period remaining. Replace or renew certificates that are close to expiring.

Notes: This check requires that certificate expiration times are provided in ISO 8601 format.
